summary: Chat messaging app with message bubbles, avatars, usernames, timestamps, and message IDs. User has reverted to version 335 and is now adjusting the layout of current user messages to mirror other users' messages.
architectural_notes: Chat UI uses message bubbles with avatars outside and metadata (username, timestamp, message ID) displayed per-message

existing_features.title: For messages sent by the current user, reorder the header elements left-to-right as: Message ID → Timestamp → Username → Avatar. This must mirror the exact same left-to-right order used for other users' messages. No styles, colors, spacing, font sizes, or any other visual properties may be changed — only the structural DOM order/positioning of these four elements.

new_feature_requests.summary: For current user messages, reorder header elements left-to-right as: Message ID → Timestamp → Username → Avatar, mirroring the layout used for other users' messages, without changing any styles
